name: Financial Department
description: The Financial Department is a well-organized workspace with rows of desks, each occupied by diligent-looking employees. Neatly stacked files line the shelves, giving the impression of a busy and efficient department. You notice a [coworker's desk], and on it lies a [suspicious-looking email] and a pile of seemingly [missing emails]
short_description: A well-organized workspace filled with busy employees.
directions: The Financial Department is connected to the Marketing Department to the north, the Archives Room to the south and the Reception Area to the west.
